title: My personal opinion
text:

but unlike romwe, u guys actually make good quality clothing at amazingly low prices. 
one thing i dont like, is that sometimes clothes will come in the mail not being sewn in some parts, or having imperfections like rips or small things that arent it- butttt if i were to return it it would be super fast!!
when i return something from SHEIN, the process goes very quick and i get my money back fast, which i love love love

title: Definitely hit or miss
text: Shein's products are very hit and miss on fit and quality for sure. I've ordered quite a few things from there and most I'd say I do end up sending back, but what I've kept I like very much and it's super CHEAP! Shipping (to U.S.) does take forever so if you are ordering for a specific occasion definitely order a few weeks ahead of time and don't always expect for it to be exactly what you imagined it would be. So if your ordering like a dress for a wedding or something and you get it just in the nick of time I'd definitely have s back up outfit plan just in case it doesn't fit or look like in the picture. I like that you can get points for reviewing and uploading pictures of their clothes and use those towards future purchases. I don't necessarily like that when you return items it goes into a shein wallet instead of back on your card, but again you can use it towards future purchases.

title: Pretty Good

There are almost always coupon codes that you can use to save money and on top of that you can earn points and use that towards your purchase! One thing I will say is ALWAYS read the reviews because they will often include pictures of everyday people wearing the clothes and on top of that they often list their size and measurements so you will know how it fits and if you should size up or down. title: Love it.
text: I’ve been using SHEIN for about two years now, the prices are perfect. You have to be smart, check the sizing chart, look at customer reviews on the items and be rational. Most of the items run a little bit small. It depends what you’re picking out. I am a size small in most tops, usually a medium (4-6) in bottoms. I almost always order one size up on each. I’ve probably made about 8 shipments at this point from them, and I’ve found something to be unwearable only when I’ve gotten the wrong size maybe twice. There are VERY few things I didn’t like on me, or things that were too small that I either returned (easy) or gave to a friend. You get what you pay for. But this is a great way to sample so many different styles for every season without emptying your wallet. Shipping has been updated and it’s also faster these days. I promise you’ll be happy.

title: My FAVORITE place to buy DIY/Craft Supplies!
text:
SHEIN is seriously my *Favorite* app and place to purchase pretty much all of my DIY/Crafting supplies! They have almost everything I need (about 95% of it), with the exception of liquid items, like glue & epoxy resin—though, they DO have a ton of amazing resin Molds! 😍
And the BEST part, is that everything is very affordable! 
They also do a LOT of promotions/sales (they have sales on items, Free Shipping promos or BOTH like every single day), so you can save even MORE on your purchases. 
I tend to wait until I can afford to make a bigger purchase during a sale on the items, so I can take advantage of those PLUS Free shipping, and it really pays off. 
There have been *very few* items that I haven’t been super pleased with (but not in a major way, by any means) and I’ve ordered a LOT of stuff though then! But even if you’re not entirely happy with an item, it’s so inexpensive that it’s not a big issue. Though, they do offer a FREE return the first time you do one (I personally haven’t felt the need to return anything yet). 
If you’re into ANY type of Craft, do nail art as a profession or hobby, or just love shipping good deals on clothing, accessories, shoes, etc. (for ANY gender/age!) then you’ve found the RIGHT app! 😍♥️😍♥️
Hope this was helpful to you 😁

title: Horrible delivery
text: This app is easy to use and has cheap clothes. Although their customer service is very polite, they are far from accommodating. When I talked to the representative from Shein, they said that I need to coordinate it with USPS?! how am i supposed to work on that? They are basically throwing me back and forth with no solution. How come domestic delivery could be this troublesome? And why can’t shein just put the label on the package to tell them to let the customer to pick up if something is wrong with the address? (which is not the case here, i have ordered countless things online and never had any problem until i ordered stuff from shein). It’s a lot easier and makes more sense. They should have overseeing the delivery as well as the customer has no control of it in any way. I have seen a lot of people have the same complaint, at this point, I would have changed the courier if I were them.

title: Love it
text: I love this app so much. They have affordable, good clothes for men, women, and kids. They also have a whole bunch of other stuff. They even have home decor. One major thing I will say though about the clothes is that you HAVE TO CHECK THE MEASUREMENTS. For example, something might be a medium, but the bust is 28in. Also, check the reviews ofc, to see what other people say. Sometimes it runs large, small, etc. Sometimes it’s a little thinner or more cropped than expected. They have a size thing that you can do (if you can’t find it on the app just look it up) and it will show you your likely sizes based on your measurements and your size compared to other brands. Then, it will tell you specifically what your size most likely is. But, if other people say it runs large or smaller, don’t go off what it tells you.

title: Never shop in a store again
text: I usually don’t write reviews but I cannot express enough how much I love this app. First off everything is Free shopping and Free Returns. This is a Chinese wholesale website however the clothing is very well made. The sizing is set up for US sizes so you don’t have to worry about something being too small. Furthermore, if someone does run small, the reviews will tell you and there’s a chart that says it runs small. Shein motivates customers to write detailed reviews in exchange for points that can be used as discounts. Similarly, the clothing items are SOO unique and cuter than anything else I would find in a local store. The shipping takes a little long but then again, if I don’t have to pay for shipping then I don’t mind. If you want quicker shipping, choose express (beggars can’t be choosers). Overall, you won’t regret this app at all!

title: Huge selection of affordable items
text:
The app is very easy to navigate. Pay attention to the reviews of the item before you buy it (sizing, is it cheap looking etc).  
You can leave a review & get Shein points which translate to Shein money. You can also check-in daily to receive points-  actually several ways to earn points- even confirming a delivery. I like how the app gives related items after you put something on your wishlist or in your cart so you can really go down a rabbit hole. Delivery is usually 9-10 days from purchase (I live in the US). Only thing is the tracking on the app is not up-to-date but Shein has a button that lets you copy the tracking number then I go to the UPS site. Huge selection! The clothes are so affordable & the jewelry is a steal! Returns are easy as well.

title: Worth it, with minor bumps
text:
I’ve had a handful of purchases from this site, each being 20+ items. The longest I’ve had to wait for my package has been 15 days.

Overall, I’ve loved the styles, prices and quality of the things I’ve chosen. I’m usually very picky about fabric quality, but just by seeing pictures of some of the items you can tell what they’ll be like irl. For me, the biggest plus is that they have very ample size selections in all styles. I think SHEIN is one of the best options for plus size clothing, and styles are either the same as those offered for standard sizes or completely unique pieces. 

I have had to return a few items because I didn’t like the fabric quality, but I haven’t had a single item look different than the pictures in the app of what I ordered. Jeans on this site are AMAZING, thick denim with quality stitching. I also love the dresses and jackets. Like I said, I can pick out quality a bit easily since I’m familiar with fabric and know what I’ll look like, so I def see some items on the site that would not fit my quality standards. Also, user reviews are critical in choosing items, since they give insight as to sizing, fit, quality and overall style. 

SHEIN has become my main source of clothing, and will continue to be in the foreseeable future.

title: Truly one (1) star service!
text: Customer service is absolutely absent! There is no customer service phone number, you have to contact them by email and only after you go through 11 prompts, then you have to submit a ticket, after that they get back to you within 24 to 48 hours, then you have to send them in your ID or drivers license, then you also have to take pictures of your credit card that you used for purchase, and then they will get back to you 24 hours later, so that’s a total of 72 hours, then they will ask you for the bank statement of the credit card purchase, and I don’t know what happens after that, because I am still waiting for a reply. I didn’t download this app to make any friends, and truth be told I didn’t download this app to make enemies either. However customer service is so rude and incompetent! That I will be definitely taking my business elsewhere! Be aware!!!!!!!!! If you have any problems with this company, it will take you a minimum of 72 hours to get anywhere with them! When it should only take minutes!

title: Customer Service 10/10
text: Okay, so it’s ALWAYS scary ordering clothes online. Especially when they’re cute and wildly affordable. Lemme tell you, their customer service and returning process is easy. ESPECIALLY if they send you the wrong item or size. The latter doesn’t happen often but I did receive a size XL bikini top when I was supposed to get a M. Well, you can’t just simply return or exchange swimwear bc it’s final sale. So I thought it was going to be straight up impossible. But no. All I did was online chat with the picture of the mistake and in five minutes I had another top processing and was simply told to just keep the other one. So truly it’s a 5/5 for customer service. The clothes though? Honestly I’ve been truly impressed with the quality and I’ve spend about $300 so far, which for shein- is A LOT. I’ve loved everything so 5/5 there too.

title: Don’t get it
text: I’ve ordered a lot of clothes from here in the past before I knew about all of the bad stuff they’ve done. The clothes are cheaply made, usually come wrinkled and the sizes are off most of the time. Most recently, I bought a sweater and I was really excited because it was on sale and I had been waiting to get it for a long time for my friend. title: Appreciate the prices, not the presentation
text:
Dear Editors,

I adore the charitable project initiative and gamification efforts towards feminism. It is truly a joyful and enlightening experience and I am happy to support a brand which takes such special care and attention to empower and enlighten women. However, please be aware the age limit for you application is 12+ and the objectifying positions of the models and products being sold can be extremely provacative and send a message counter intuitive to your charitable cares initiative. An edit in the area of the positioning of the model photography and an age limit restriction on what can be viewed to purchase would be wise and commendable. We're all working together to make dreams come true and the world as it should be. I am so glad I discovered this brand and hope to see it progress in the future.

title: Misleading customers with delivery timings
text:
The first time I have ordered from SHEIN I have to admit the quality of the clothes are amazing. Now I am ordering for the second time and I have to admit there aren’t professional whatsoever regarding the time of delivery. 
I have talked to support before placing my order (in order to make sure I’m receiving it before my travel)!!!! she informed me about the express delivery business days to the country I’m living in which was “3-8 days” after processing. 
After placing the order, it got proceed within one or two days, and it said it has been shipped, I talked to the support again to check the  shipment expected delivery date, and informed that from the date it was shipped it needs 10-30 days to be delivered ???! Are you kidding me ??? I have to wait one month after I paid extra money for express delivery and I won’t be even in the country! 
If you knew it would be late you were suppose to inform me from the beginning regarding it. 
This is called MISLEADING AND UNPROFESSIONAL ATTITUDE AND BEHAVIOR! Extremely DISAPPOINTED!!!

title: Cheaply made
text:
The app’s search function isn’t great—lots of filters, but the results don’t always correlate to the filters you selected, and sometimes after viewing an item and then going back to the search results you have to do the whole search/filter process over again to bring back the list of results you were working with a minute ago. 
And, things go out of stock incredibly quickly. If you bought one size and it didn’t fit, don’t expect to be able to buy a different size of the same dress a week later. 
And, I realize this doesn’t bother everyone, but it bothers me so I’ll mention it: the grammar is atrocious to the point where some things don’t even make sense. It doesn’t cost that much to hire an editor to make sure your website and customer service communications look professional, and the lack of attention to detail/accuracy feed into my expectation of low quality. 

Now for the clothing review: in addition to buying some, myself, I examined a TON of Shein clothes back when I worked for a thrift store. They scream “poor quality.” However nice it looks in photos, be prepared for it to be thin and semi-rough-feeling fabric; half the items need a slip in order to be wearable in public. One dress I received had a seam coming apart right in front.
They run true to size unless you have a small bust or narrow shoulders, in which case anything off-the-shoulder may not stay up.

I would never recommend this company to anyone.

title: Couldn’t have found Shein at a better time!
text: It’s no secret that no matter where you’re at in the world, money is getting tight for the majority of people in the world. Harder to keep gas in your car, harder to afford those nice meals at a restaurant, harder to keep all your paid subscriptions and even hard to pay for necessities like food and shelter. SHEIN is the lowest priced website that I’ve ever heard of all around, and they take their business seriously. Everything is thorough and as fast as it could possibly be considering all that goes into getting everyone there correct orders and in a timely manner. I would recommend Shein whether you’re struggling with money a little, down to your last and trying to make ends meet, or wealthy but still want inexpensive things to enjoy. 12/10

title: Love it!
text: I recently got this after a friend recommended it and I was almost positive it was going to be a complete sham, but I was very pleasantly surprised that all of the clothing is very cute and extremely cheap! I don’t know how they get such low prices, but all their clothing super trendy and super affordable. I also love how the give tons of information on sizing (such as the dimensions of the model, how big the XS is compared to the S, ect.). This makes it much easier to see how the clothing will fit you before buying it. There’s always some sort of deal or discount that you can get, and the only thing that I would like to change is the SHEIN Points that you can earn to put towards buying more products. After a while they expire and this is kind of frustrating after you have so many build up and they just go away, but even with this, I really love this app and would totally recommend getting it!

title: 1 Month return still no refund
text:
If you order the wrong look or they just don’t have another size to exchange for then expect to wait awhile for a refund. As I am writing this my 1 month(30 day) return order still has not been refunded. When I head over to customer support, I am faced with an automated robot. When attempting to “submit a ticket” there is no option and I get reverted back to the robot who has no knowledge of my return. It’s not until you head over to the return section that I still see the return processing and with no update or no way of asking if something has happened. Safe to say I just got scammed for $150. Never purchasing from here again, and I plan on seeing a lawyer to figure out how to settle this and get my money back being that the app offers me no other options.

Edit: After developer response, I would like to state that the response given only leads you to an automated robot who sends you in a never ending loop. There is no way to get a hold of an actual human.

title: Shein<3
text: I love this app very much . Probably the app I buy clothing and accessories from the most. And very cheap which is good because I’m broke most of the time. But please keep in mind that cheap will most likely give you kind of good to decent to kind of bad quality. But that doesn’t mean it’s bad or ok all the time . They have some really cute stuff and they keep up with trends . But it will cost you a little more (like US 30-50$) for better quality for pants, shirts, hoodies, cardigans, etc. The only reason it’s four stars is for the really cheap stuff the quality is noticeably lower and I’ve experienced shirts being different colors than what was ordered. Other than that it’s a pretty good app for some clothes that are trendy, chic, and questionable. Before I go I will just say one more thing ! Stan BTS, Twice, Enhypen, TXT, stray kids, LE SSERAFIM, Ateez, All Nct’s, and Ive for clear skin and good grades 😍🤞.

title: This app is one of the best.
text: This app has tons of varieties of clothes and usually their clothes have good material as well as other stuff when you receive the clothes. The only thing I do not like about this app is the shipping fee. It is like 4 dollars to pay for shipping without the price of your clothes. If they didn’t have a shipping fee I would give this app five stars because it is fantastic. You get lots of coupons, which can always benefit to free shipping. The models are gorgeous, and the clothes are fantastic! I haven’t really tried any of their jewelry but I’m sure they are just as good. Sometimes it’s frustrating because The clothes and other items take so long to ship, but the advantage is you can add as many things as you want in your cart and your will receive them eventually. I love this app just wish they had free shipping! This is a definitely recommend app for anything and anyone! 💖

title: Items Never Delivered and Refund was not given
text: Used to like shein the only reason I did a haul was because everything came at once. First time since being a customer they decided to switch shipping vendors and my items came in 3 packages. Received the first which was small my jacket in my mailbox. The second said it was signed but never delivered so I began a dispute. They refunded me for two dresses and then the same happened with the 3rd which had 3 more dresses. Went to dispute those items never received and they said they would check with the shipping distributor and but emailed me saying it was delivered… how?????? I didn’t even get the second package how did the 3rd deliver? I requested they resend the items over a refund since those dresses for for work.  They stopped responding to my inquiry and I’m even more frustrated about that. I’m deleting the app and will shop online elsewhere going forward. I also plan to make a report to the BBB because I see this is the same issues other customers are having.

title: Love It Here!  I gave you 4.3 star rating
text: I absolutely love their kids clothing and prices . Everything I’ve ordered thus far has been just as described on the site. The plus clothing are very fashionable and accurate to size. And I really love that there are colors and prints of many different choice in the plus sizes. The ordering process is simple and easy to maneuver through. If I had to say anything negative at all it would only be about the way several packages are stuffed in a box all together and that some of the wall decor and jewelry got bent/damaged during the delivery process. But even those things were minor and easy to repair. Overall I’m totally obsessed with this store and have and will continue to shop here for as long as I can afford to. P.S. The coupons are insane savings on already low affordable priced  products . Thanks SHEIN I absolutely LOVE IT HERE!!!!!!!
